name: mstapst
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

body.origin:
|- wss(c0, c1)
-| wceq(c0, crn(cfv(cmsr, c2)))
-| wss(crn(cfv(cmsr, c2)), c1)
body.pretty:
⊢ c0 ⊆ c1
⊣ c0 = ran((mStRed ` c2))
⊣ ran((mStRed ` c2))⊆ c1

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(c0, c1)
-| wceq(c0, crn(cfv(cmsr, c2)))
-| wss(crn(cfv(cmsr, c2)), c1)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 ⊆ c1
⊣ c0 = ran((mStRed ` c2))
⊣ ran((mStRed ` c2))⊆ c1

body.origin:
|- wceq(c0, crn(cfv(cmsr, c2)))
-| wceq(cfv(cmsr, c2), cfv(cmsr, c2))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cmsta, c2))
body.pretty:
⊢ c0 = ran((mStRed ` c2))
⊣ (mStRed ` c2)=(mStRed ` c2)
⊣ c0 =(mStat ` c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(c0, c1)
-| wss(crn(cfv(cmsr, c2)), c1)
-| wceq(cfv(cmsr, c2), cfv(cmsr, c2))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cmsta, c2))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 ⊆ c1
⊣ ran((mStRed ` c2))⊆ c1
⊣ (mStRed ` c2)=(mStRed ` c2)
⊣ c0 =(mStat ` c2)

stmt.origin: ax-mp(wss(crn(cfv(cmsr, c2)), c1), wf(cfv(cmsr, c2), c1, c1))
stmt.pretty: ax-mp(ran((mStRed ` c2))⊆ c1, ((mStRed ` c2): c1 → c1))

body.origin:
|- wss(crn(cfv(cmsr, c2)), c1)
-| wf(cfv(cmsr, c2), c1, c1)
-| wi(wf(cfv(cmsr, c2), c1, c1), wss(crn(cfv(cmsr, c2)), c1))
body.pretty:
⊢ ran((mStRed ` c2))⊆ c1
⊣ ((mStRed ` c2): c1 → c1)
⊣ (((mStRed ` c2): c1 → c1)→ ran((mStRed ` c2))⊆ c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(c0, c1)
-| wceq(cfv(cmsr, c2), cfv(cmsr, c2))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cmsta, c2))
-| wf(cfv(cmsr, c2), c1, c1)
-| wi(wf(cfv(cmsr, c2), c1, c1), wss(crn(cfv(cmsr, c2)), c1))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 ⊆ c1
⊣ (mStRed ` c2)=(mStRed ` c2)
⊣ c0 =(mStat ` c2)
⊣ ((mStRed ` c2): c1 → c1)
⊣ (((mStRed ` c2): c1 → c1)→ ran((mStRed ` c2))⊆ c1)

body.origin:
|- wf(cfv(cmsr, c2), c1, c1)
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cmpst, c2))
-| wceq(cfv(cmsr, c2), cfv(cmsr, c2))
body.pretty:
⊢ ((mStRed ` c2): c1 → c1)
⊣ c1 =(mPreSt ` c2)
⊣ (mStRed ` c2)=(mStRed ` c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(c0, c1)
-| wceq(cfv(cmsr, c2), cfv(cmsr, c2))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cmsta, c2))
-| wi(wf(cfv(cmsr, c2), c1, c1), wss(crn(cfv(cmsr, c2)), c1))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cmpst, c2))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 ⊆ c1
⊣ (mStRed ` c2)=(mStRed ` c2)
⊣ c0 =(mStat ` c2)
⊣ (((mStRed ` c2): c1 → c1)→ ran((mStRed ` c2))⊆ c1)
⊣ c1 =(mPreSt ` c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(c0, c1)
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cmsta, c2))
-| wi(wf(cfv(cmsr, c2), c1, c1), wss(crn(cfv(cmsr, c2)), c1))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cmpst, c2))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 ⊆ c1
⊣ c0 =(mStat ` c2)
⊣ (((mStRed ` c2): c1 → c1)→ ran((mStRed ` c2))⊆ c1)
⊣ c1 =(mPreSt ` c2)

body.origin: |- wi(wf(cfv(cmsr, c2), c1, c1), wss(crn(cfv(cmsr, c2)), c1))
body.pretty: ⊢ (((mStRed ` c2): c1 → c1)→ ran((mStRed ` c2))⊆ c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(c0, c1)
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cmsta, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cmpst, c2))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 ⊆ c1
⊣ c0 =(mStat ` c2)
⊣ c1 =(mPreSt ` c2)

comment: A statement is a pre-statement. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jul-2016.)
